mapper.sql: id, common_id, replenishment_status, arrival_status, number_plate, register_date, update_date, creator, updater, delete_flag
mapper.select:
select a.* from (select t.id,t2.ship_number,t2.segmentation,t2.batch,t2.part_number,t.replenishment_status,t.arrival_status,t.number_plate,t.update_date from t_acc_seplenishment t LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t2 ON t.common_id = t2.id where t.delete_flag = 0 AND (t.replenishment_status = 1 OR t.arrival_status = 1) AND t.update_date BETWEEN date_format(#{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ) a
LIMIT #{pageNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select count(*) from (select t.id,t2.ship_number,t2.batch,t2.part_number,t.replenishment_status,t.arrival_status,t.number_plate,t.update_date from t_acc_seplenishment t LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t2 ON t.common_id = t2.id where t.delete_flag = 0 AND (t.replenishment_status = 1 OR t.arrival_status = 1) AND t.update_date BETWEEN date_format(#{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ) a

SELECT t.common_id,t1.part_number FROM t_acc_seplenishment t LEFT JOIN t_acc_commoninfo t1 ON t.common_id = t1.id WHERE t.arrival_status = 0 AND t.replenishment_status = 0 AND t.number_plate is not null AND t.delete_flag = 0 AND t1.delete_flag = 0 AND t.id IN
#{item.id}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_acc_seplenishment (id, common_id, replenishment_status, arrival_status, number_plate, register_date, update_date, creator, updater, delete_flag) values
(null, #{item}, 1, 1, null, #{registerDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0)

update.foreach: UPDATE t_acc_seplenishment SET replenishment_status = #{item.replenishmentStatus}, number_plate = #{item.numberPlate}, updater = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = SYSDATE() WHERE delete_flag = 0 AND ID = #{item.id}
UPDATE t_acc_seplenishment SET arrival_status = #{item.arrivalStatus}, updater = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = SYSDATE() WHERE delete_flag = 0 AND ID = #{item.id}

mapper.insert: insert into t_acc_seplenishment (id, common_id, replenishment_status, arrival_status, number_plate, register_date, update_date, creator, updater, delete_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commonId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{replenishmentStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{arrivalStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numberPlate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

id,

replenishment_status,
arrival_status,
number_plate,

update_date,
creator,
updater,

update t_acc_seplenishment
common_id = #{commonId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
replenishment_status = #{replenishmentStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
arrival_status = #{arrivalStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
number_plate = #{numberPlate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
register_date = #{registerDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updater = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_acc_seplenishment set common_id = #{commonId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, replenishment_status = #{replenishmentStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, arrival_status = #{arrivalStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, number_plate = #{numberPlate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, register_date = #{registerDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updater = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
